price: (20) And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
